name: Darth Vader Look-Alike

physical_specifications.build: Massive and intimidating frame — broad chest, thick arms and legs, towering presence emphasized by heavy armor plating.
physical_specifications.posture: Rigid, upright stance with squared shoulders and chest thrust forward; dominant and imposing.
physical_specifications.body_proportions: Heroic, exaggerated proportions; armor enhances size and bulk.

helmet.style: Glossy black domed helmet with elongated face mask.
helmet.details: Angular cheek guards, triangular mouth vent grille, recessed dark eye lenses.

facial_structure.skin_tone: Not visible — fully covered by suit.

costume.helmet: Iconic glossy black domed helmet with angular mask and grille.
costume.armor: Black armored chest plates with vertical ridges, connected shoulder pauldrons, and gauntlets.
costume.control_panel: Chest-mounted life-support system with illuminated buttons (red, green, blue).
costume.cape: Long, flowing black cape extending to the floor; heavy drape, matte finish.
costume.bodysuit: Tightly fitted ribbed black leather underlayer covering entire body.
costume.belt: Utility belt with glowing control units and metal buckles.
costume.boots: Polished black knee-high boots, armored and rigid.
costume.weapon: Red-bladed lightsaber, glowing with bright core and subtle aura; held firmly in right hand.

lighting_behavior: Armor and helmet reflect harsh light dramatically, cape absorbs shadow; red lightsaber casts ambient glow on body and surrounding environment.
energy_personality: Dark, commanding, authoritarian presence; slow, deliberate movements. Voice deep, resonant, and mechanical.
voice_style: Target: Classic dark baritone performance — very deep, calm; cadence slow, imposing; ~115 wpm; neutral American; studio-dry, close-mic; no reverb/chorus; no robotic TTS artefacts; avoid exact James‑Earl‑Jones imitation; no breathing SFX.
